channel.title: meta on Martin Baillie
channel.description: Recent content in meta on Martin Baillie

item.title: Fieldnotes
item.description: Well here we are! I had held off from spewing words onto the internet in long-form until now. That I have made it this far with a new site and first post has been the culmination of: The compound guilt felt as a practiced user of other people’s technical writing to my professional advantage. The accidental consumption of multiple “why you should write a technical blog”-themed posts in quickfire succession from my feeds.
